statements: DELETE FROM waste_facilities WHERE waste_type = 'Plastic' AND facility_location = 'City A';
DELETE FROM waste_facilities WHERE facility_name = 'West Coast Recycling' AND efficiency_rating >= 0.75;
DELETE FROM waste_records WHERE waste_quantity > 100 AND collection_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM waste_facilities WHERE waste_type = 'Organic Waste' AND location = 'Warehouse B';
DELETE FROM WasteProcesses WHERE facility_id = 200 AND process_type = 'recycling';
DELETE FROM WasteTrucks WHERE status = 'Under Maintenance' AND capacity < 500
DELETE FROM WasteManagementCompanies WHERE company_name = 'ABC Waste Management'
